items.strItemDescription: I hope you got all your exercise in this year... Only a month left after Black Friday '15!
This helm gleams even in blackest night!
The most evil of smells... burnt bacon... follows you with the Black Friday '15 spear!

items.strItemDescription: Now with 1300% more Darkness! Enjoy your Black Friday '15 weapon!
